description.zh: code-server 是一个开源项目，通过在远程服务器上运行 VS Code 并在浏览器中访问，实现云端编程。它允许开发者从任何设备访问功能完整的开发环境。该工具适用于远程开发场景，利用云基础设施提升性能与开发一致性。
description.en: code-server is an open-source project that enables running VS Code in a browser by hosting it on a remote server. It allows developers to access a full-featured coding environment from any device, anywhere. This tool is ideal for remote development, leveraging cloud infrastructure for better performance and consistency.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 在任意设备上访问一致的开发环境
- 利用强大的云服务器加速编译、测试和下载任务
- 通过将高负载任务转移到服务器端，延长笔记本电脑电池续航

## 功能列表:

- 在浏览器中完整运行 VS Code
- 支持插件、主题和设置同步
- 支持通过脚本、手动或云平台一键部署安装
- 集成 devcontainers，支持容器化开发环境
- 可自托管，支持自定义配置和安全管控
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Access a consistent development environment across all devices
- Leverage powerful cloud servers to accelerate compilation, testing, and downloads
- Extend laptop battery life by offloading intensive tasks to the server

## Features:

- Run VS Code entirely in the browser
- Support for extensions, themes, and settings synchronization
- Easy installation via script, manual setup, or cloud deployment
- Integration with devcontainers for containerized development environments
- Self-hosted solution with support for custom configuration and security controls
